titleInfo.title: Baker and McKenna Boxing Match in Leadville, Colorado

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#359, Olympic Athletic Club Boxing match between Baker and McKenna Dec 1 1911 (McKenna's seconds threw up sponge in 10th round).'' On envelope: ''#359 Leadville Boxing Match 1911.''

mods.abstract: Boxing match between Howard Baker and Patsy McKenna, being held in Leadville, Colorado. The match was held at the Olympic Athletic Club on December 12, 1911. McKenna's Second (trainer) threw in the sponge in the 10th round.
mods.note: Full names and exact date were found at www.boxrec.com.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
